# Life Expectancy vs. GDP per Capita

In this analysis, we explore how life expectancy relates to a countryâ€™s GDP per capita over time. Higher GDP per capita often correlates with better access to healthcare, nutrition, and education, potentially leading to increased life expectancy.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt

gapminder = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
chart = alt.Chart(gapminder).mark_circle(size=60).encode(
    x='gdp_per_capita:Q',
    y='life_expectancy:Q',
    color='continent:N',
    tooltip=['country:N','year:O','life_expectancy:Q','gdp_per_capita:Q']
).properties(
    width=600,
    height=400,
    title="Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita"
).interactive()

chart
```
